sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'
import * as d3 from 'd3'

const TimelineChart = ({
  data,
  handleLabelClick,
  onDataReceived,
  onWordDataReceived,
  onExpDataReceived,
  eventColor,
}) => {
  const svgRef = useRef()

  useEffect(() => {
    if (data && data.length > 0) {
      drawTimeline(data)
    }
  }, [data, eventColor])

  const drawTimeline = (data) => {
    const svg = d3.select(svgRef.current)
    svg.selectAll('*').remove()

    const margin = { top: 20, right: 15, bottom: 30, left: 100 }
    const width = +svg.attr('width') - margin.left - margin.right
    const height = +svg.attr('height') - margin.top - margin.bottom

    const x = d3
      .scaleTime()
      .domain([
        d3.min(data, (d) => d3.min(d.times, (t) => t.starting_time)),
        d3.max(data, (d) => d3.max(d.times, (t) => t.ending_time)),
      ])
      .range([0, width])

    const y = d3
      .scaleBand()
      .domain(data.map((d) => d.label))
      .range([0, height])
      .padding(0.1)

    const xAxis = svg
      .append('g')
      .attr('class', 'x-axis')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${height + margin.top})`)
      .call(d3.axisBottom(x).tickSizeOuter(0))

    // Adicionar o eixo Y
    svg
      .append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`)
      .call(d3.axisLeft(y))

    // Criar grupos de eventos
    const eventsGroup = svg
      .append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`)
      .selectAll('g.event-group')
      .data(data)
      .enter()
      .append('g')
      .attr('class', 'event-group')
      .attr('transform', (d) => `translate(0, ${y(d.label)})`)

    // Renderizar os retângulos dos eventos
    eventsGroup
      .selectAll('rect')
      .data((d) => d.times)
      .enter()
      .append('rect')
      .attr('class', 'event-rect')
      .attr('x', (d) => x(new Date(d.starting_time)))
      .attr('y', 0) // Ajuste para 0, pois estamos em um grupo
      .attr('width', (d) =>
        Math.max(0, x(new Date(d.ending_time)) - x(new Date(d.starting_time)))
      )
      .attr('height', y.bandwidth())
      .attr('fill', (d, i) =>
        eventColor ? eventColor : d3.schemeCategory10[i % 10]
      ) // Usa a cor passada ou uma cor padrão

    // Comportamento de zoom
    const zoomBehavior = d3
      .zoom()
      .scaleExtent([1, 10])
      .on('zoom', (event) => {
        const newX = event.transform.rescaleX(x)

        // Atualizar o eixo X com a nova escala
        xAxis.call(d3.axisBottom(newX).ticks(10))

        // Atualizar a posição e a largura dos retângulos
        eventsGroup
          .selectAll('rect')
          .attr('x', (d) => newX(new Date(d.starting_time)))
          .attr('width', (d) =>
            Math.max(
              0,
              newX(new Date(d.ending_time)) - newX(new Date(d.starting_time))
            )
          )
      })

    svg.call(zoomBehavior)
  }

  return <svg ref={svgRef} width={1300} height={400}></svg>
}

export default TimelineChart
